dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 4290 PCS: Wakefield Act of 2014
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and placed on the calendar

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize the Emergency Medical Services for Children Program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Wakefield Act of 2014.

section.header: Reauthorization of Emergency Medical Services for Children Program
section.text: Section 1910(d) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 300wâ€“9(d)) is amended by striking fiscal year 2014 and inserting each of fiscal years 2015 through 2019.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives September 9, 2014.

endorsement.action-desc: Received; read twice and placed on the calendar
